definitions.text: the act of giving an account describing incidents or a course of events
performance of music or dance especially by soloists
a public instance of reciting or repeating (from memory) something prepared in advance
examples: the program included songs and recitations of well-loved poems

definitions.text: a detailed statement giving facts and figures
examples: his wife gave a recital of his infidelities

definitions.text: a detailed account or description of something
examples: he was forced to listen to a recital of his many shortcomings
